alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 19 at 2:04PM PDT until May 20 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Most areas of the Rogue, Illinois, and Applegate Valleys away from urban areas of Grants Pass and Medford. This includes Ashland, Phoenix, Talent, White City, Eagle Point, Shady Cove, Butte Falls, Selma, Cave Junctions, and Obrien. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas in higher elevation surrounding these valleys may see temperatures briefly reach freezing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County
